system.description:
At 10th level you gain resistance to your choice of lightning, cold, or acid damage, and can change which type whenever you finish a short or long rest.  In addition, whenever you finish a long rest you are surrounded by a thin shield of water that absorbs incoming damage, granting you temporary hit points equal to your witch level + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Finally, when you cast the free Amphibious alter self spell granted by Annointed by the Waves, it no longer requires concentration.
